channel.title: Arx - End of Sun (Arx Fatalis prequel)
channel.description:
Just found this awesome looking Doom 3 mod that creates a prequel to Arx Fatalis (which is also great, play it if you haven't already). They even written permission from Zenimax/Arkane, so there won't be any cease and desist bullshit. Looks like these guys have their shit together.
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/arx-end-of-sun/[/url]
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WUNp-gjV7ec[/url]
Apparently they're now working with The Dark Mod to get some asset swapping going, so I suspect that will cut a lot of their dev time out. I hope.
